Title: Relates to creating a nursing home resident quality and safety study
Summary: Relates to creating a nursing home resident quality and safety study to study the implementation of a globally recognized frailty index score methodology in nursing homes in New York state.
LawCode: Add ยง2804-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating a nursing home resident quality and safety study; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
